CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When attending a meeting using a Teams Rooms on Windows device, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available on the Teams Rooms on Windows device for all in-tenant meetings. This feature requires the Teams Rooms Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: When attending a meeting in a Teams Rooms on Windows, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available as long as the meeting organizer is not a designated resource account. This feature is available Teams Rooms Pro.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
CurrentVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
OldVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio zones enable Mesh creators to craft custom audio experiences
CurrentVersion.description: Spatial audio in Mesh provides a realistic recreation of how sound moves in the real world, with the volume of people speaking or media playing getting lower of as you move away from the source of the sound.  The introduction of audio zones enables creators to craft custom audio experiences for the intended use of a space with features such as extended audio drop off distances for conversations that happen in a large area, or restricting what audio can enter a given area, to allow smaller groups to have lively conversations without disrupting their neighbors.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio zones enable Mesh creators to craft custom audio experiences
OldVersion.description: Spatial audio in Mesh provides a realistic recreation of how sound moves in the real world, with the volume of people speaking or media playing getting lower of as you move away from the source of the sound.  The introduction of audio zones enables creators to craft custom audio experiences for the intended use of a space with features such as extended audio drop off distances for conversations that happen in a large area, or restricting what audio can enter a given area, to allow smaller groups to have lively conversations without disrupting their neighbors.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams chat support in Mesh events
CurrentVersion.description: Participants in Mesh events on PC and Mac can use Teams chat to communicate with all participants, across all rooms, within a Mesh event. Users can do this in the Microsoft Mesh PC app, the Mesh app in Teams, as well as in the chat message list of the Teams app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams chat support in Mesh events
OldVersion.description: Participants in Mesh events on PC and Mac can use Teams chat to communicate with all participants, across all rooms, within a Mesh event. Users can do this in the Microsoft Mesh PC app, the Mesh app in Teams, as well as in the chat message list of the Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to exclude users and groups from IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice and Face biometric data export controls
CurrentVersion.description: This new feature provides controls for biometric data export for users. To ensure security and protection of user privacy, individuals can export their own biometric data, limiting risk of download or sharing by tenant administrators.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice and Face biometric data export controls
OldVersion.description: This new feature provides controls for biometric data export for users. To ensure security and protection of user privacy, individuals can export their own biometric data limiting risk of download or sharing by tenant administrators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room audio auto-detect and pre-select in BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: When users connect their laptop to a room's shared peripheral through USB, Teams automatically detects the room's audio and recommends connecting on the pre-join screen, streamlining the bring your own device (BYOD) meeting room experience. For room devices (e.g., displays, audio devices) recognized as shared and on Microsoft's known BYOD devices list, users will automatically transition to the room's audio upon connection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh events allows for even better collaboration for more people by now supporting guest user attendees into the Mesh PC app. Event organizers can invite guest users outside their organization, providing an opportunity for broader collaboration and networking in Mesh events. Guests can sign in to the Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest user creation follows the existing process for tenant guest user creation (outside of Mesh). For this release, guest users would require a Teams Premium license, just like regular tenant attendees, to collaborate within Mesh. Guest access for the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events
OldVersion.description: Attendees can now join Mesh events as a guest in the Microsoft Mesh app on PC. Event organizers can invite guest users outside their organization, providing an opportunity for broader collaboration and networking in Mesh events. Guests can sign in to Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest access for events in the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Non-Copilot cohort and exclusion list using AAD Groups (Entra ID)
CurrentVersion.description: For the Copilot dashboard, the non-Copilot user cohort list and exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Offline app boot
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to open or restart the new Outlook for Windows when not connected to the internet. Previously, you needed a connection to the internet to open or restart the new Outlook. Offline access is only supported when the app is already running and then goes offline. Opening and restarting the app while offline will be introduced with this rollout. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
CurrentVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manual sync trigger options for provider data
CurrentVersion.description: Customers can manually trigger sync for different data types on Manage providers in Viva Learning admin page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Sync provider data from specific dates
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing flexibility on provider setup form where admins can sync data from specific dates for a provider instead of full data sync.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Editorial Card web part in SharePoint Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a Web Part called the Editorial Card to enhance page experiences. This card-like container allows for manual creation tailored to your needs, creating eye-catching content to capture viewers’ attentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Pop-up enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the functionality of oversharing pop-ups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled and Message/Attachment is not labeled, File extension is. It will also support a customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Baseline with Task level variance
CurrentVersion.description: Capture a Baseline of your plan and view plan and task-level variances to know if the plan is on track or delayed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: File and conversation admin settings in Engage admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now manage file and conversation-related settings from the Engage admin center without being routed to the legacy Yammer admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IntelliFrame video feed on Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Cloud IntelliFrame, the video framing feature that enhances the visibility of people in the room for online meeting attendees, is now available for Teams mobile users when they join a meeting that has participants in a Teams Rooms on Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Refresh queries from Authenticated Data Sources in Excel for the Web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now refresh Power Query data from data sources that require authentication in Excel for the Web.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Refresh queries from Authenticated Data Sources in Excel for the Web
OldVersion.description: You can now refresh Power Query data from data sources that require authentication in Excel for the Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Security policy violations by risky users
CurrentVersion.description: Enabled by the HR 1.2 connector, this policy template detects security violations by users near a stressor event. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Security policy violations by risky users
OldVersion.description: Enabled by the HR 1.2 connector, this policy template detects security violations by users near a stressor event. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Breakout rooms support for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With breakout room support, Teams Rooms on Windows can be added to a breakout room and moved in and out of the main room making it easy for breakout session coordination.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Breakout rooms support for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: With breakout room support, Teams Rooms on Windows can be added to a breakout room and moved in and out of the main room making it easy for breakout session coordination.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Contact deduplication on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: People are at the center of our lives, and we start every digital connection via contacts. Hence, a clean, up-to-date contact list is critical for better collaboration and productivity. We are happy to announce that cleaning up duplicate contacts just got a lot easier with the de-duplication feature on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web

OldVersion.title: Outlook for the Web: Contact Deduplication
OldVersion.description: People are at the center of our lives, and we start every digital connection via contacts. Hence, a clean, up-to-date contact list is critical for better collaboration and productivity. We are happy to announce that cleaning up duplicate contacts just got a lot easier with the de-duplication feature in Outlook Web App (OWA).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting recordings will be saved to meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: With this change Teams meeting recordings will be saved to the meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business instead of to the OneDrive for Business folder of the person who initiated the recording. This improves the compliance of recordings as meeting organizers can then manage access permissions and recording file management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management: New retention actions in Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: We will release additional retention actions as part of the Power Automate integration with Microsoft Purview Records Management. You can now relabel a file or an email at the end of its retention period or apply a retention label to a file in SharePoint. You can also delete items in SharePoint, OneDrive, or Exchange with all executed retention actions recorded in the Microsoft Purview Audit log.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Power Automate integration (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Power Automate workflow when the item reaches the end of its retention period. For example, execute a complex disposition approval process or move the file to an archive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Group chat profile picture
CurrentVersion.description: You will have a better way to reflect your team and group chat topic, with custom pictures. Group chat members can upload an image or use pre-selected illustrations and emojis, adding a layer of inclusivity and expression to their chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Follow a meeting in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Follow is a new meeting response (RSVP) option that goes beyond the traditional Accept, Tentative and Decline choices geared towards individuals with high meeting loads and conflicting meetings each day. Follow is the ideal RSVP option for meetings you can't attend but still want to stay engaged and receive info about. Other attendees will be able to see if you are following a meeting. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Note: This began rolling out in May and not April. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Follow a meeting in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Follow is a new meeting response (RSVP) option that goes beyond the traditional Accept, Tentative and Decline choices geared towards individuals with high meeting loads and conflicting meetings each day. Follow is the ideal RSVP option for meetings you can't attend but still want to stay engaged and receive info about. Other attendees will be able to see if you are following a meeting. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. Note: This began rolling out in May and not April. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) support for SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: Optical character recognition (OCR) support will detect sensitive content in images and subsequently apply data loss prevention (DLP) policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data in SharePoint Online and OneDrive. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP, and PDF (image-only PDF).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
CurrentVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Optical character recognition (OCR) support for Exchange Online and Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Optical character recognition (OCR) support will detect sensitive content in images and subsequently apply data loss prevention (DLP) policies to prevent exfiltration of that sensitive data in Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams. This release supports key file types like JPG, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, BMP and PDF (image only PDF).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
CurrentVersion.description: With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall
CurrentVersion.description: Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Work hour access controls for Front Line Workers
CurrentVersion.description: Allows IT admins to establish no Teams notifications or access when workers clock out of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online
CurrentVersion.description: This release will extend OCR support in Exchange online from standalone images (JPEG, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, PDF) to images embedded inside following files: 1. Office: Images embedded inside XLSX, DOCX, PPTX files. 2. PDF: Image-only PDF files are already supported. This release will support hybrid PDF files containing images and searchable text. 3. Container files such as ZIP, RAR, 7Z, BZ and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai Language in Endpoint
CurrentVersion.description: Thai Language sentences do not have spaces in between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy in EndPoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai language in Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: In our continued efforts to enhance classification capabilities, we have added a new feature, Word-Breaker, to our existing Thai Language support in Classification. Words in Thai language sentences do not have spaces between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on the right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy across all cloud locations (Exchange, Teams, One Drive, SharePoint).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management-Insider risk context in Microsoft Defender user entity page
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, any SOC analyst with the required customer-determined permissions can access an insider risk summary of user activities that may lead to potential data security incidents, as a part of the user entity investigation experience in Microsoft Defender. This feature can help SOC analysts gain insider risk context for a specific user and make more informed decisions on responses to potential incidents.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bring the latest from your organization into your Word chats with Microsoft Copilot Graph-grounded search
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the rich, people-centric data and insights in the Microsoft cloud. That's the power of Copilot and Microsoft Graph.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Prepare for Meetings with Copilot in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: With so many of us in back-to-back meetings, it can be a real struggle to stay on top of pre-reads, action items, and even what each meeting is about. Copilot can identify and summarize the key points so you can show up prepared in just a few minutes. When you have an upcoming meeting, Copilot proactively shows you a "Prepare" button in your inbox which helps you quickly get context for the meeting providing a summary of the meeting and showing and summarizing relevant files leveraging the power of the Microsoft Graph. Now you have all the most important details you need and can arrive prepared and ready to engage in a productive conversation. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Support for Four New predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
With this capability, admins can extend the below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint
- Document is unscannable
- Document didn't complete scanning
- Document name matches patterns
- Document size equals or is greater than

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Information Protection and Insider Risk Management support multicloud environments
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Information Protection extends its sensitivity labels and protection policies into data contained in Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3. Organizations can create label-based protection policies that specify which data sources, databases, or storage buckets are in scope, and which users or groups are allowed to access data with a certain sensitivity label and Purview will automatically enforce the policy and block unauthorized access to sensitive data. Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Note: We have updated the cloud environments to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Outlook win32 DLP Policy tip and oversharing popup support for new DLP Predicates
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates support for DLP Policy tips and Oversharing popups for E5 users: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on client-side evaluation on specific email components like email body or attachments only. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components only and show DLP Policy tips and oversharing popups accordingly in Outlook win32.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection
CurrentVersion.description: A new product usage report will be added in the Microsoft 365 admin center, providing insights into active usage of Microsoft Copilot with enterprise data protection. The report will include total active users, average daily active users, and active users per platform (e.g. Microsoft 365 App, Edge, Copilot.cloud.microsoft). Usage insights can be viewed as totals and trends for the past 7, 30, 90, or 180-day periods. The report will also show the last activity date per user, anonymized by default.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Enhancements to available metadata for search and collection queries
CurrentVersion.description: This is cancelled because this is released as part of the new modern ux: 383744. Now eDiscovery admins can use additional metadata to search and collect content within their organization. The additional metadata that will be added for support will include message ID, sensitivity label and more to help enable additional flexibility of search for specific scenarios to enable specific outcomes related to investigations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Have follow-up conversations with the team
CurrentVersion.description: Get a better understanding of survey results within Viva Pulse reports with team conversations. This item was updated incorrectly and has been corrected.  We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular trigger throttling
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, we are introducing more granular trigger throttling limits to isolate the impact of a surge in noisy trigger volumes and prevent other policies from being affected. This ensures that organizations can receive critical alerts without being throttled by these limits. By default, the throttling limits will be applied as follows: All sensitive triggers, including HR signals, Azure AD leavers, and custom triggers, will be limited to 15,000 per day per trigger. All other triggers will be limited to 5,000 per day per trigger. Additionally, the policy health warning messages will be enhanced to assist admins with appropriate permissions in identifying and addressing noisy triggers effectively. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Campaign Enhancements - Targeted campaigns and campaigns in the digest.
CurrentVersion.description: Corporate communications and campaign managers will now have the capability to effectively promote their campaigns by sending notifications directly to users, ensuring they are promptly informed about new campaigns and can readily participate in them. Additionally, campaigns will be discoverable in the engage digest, enhancing visibility and engagement opportunities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams Meetings will take the meeting chat into account
CurrentVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in Teams Meetings a question, it will use the chat and transcript as the source.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Improved Resume OOB Built-in Trainable Classifier
CurrentVersion.description: The new enhanced Resume Classifier is equipped with better technology. It has a higher accuracy and is able to identify resumes that were not previously detected. The classifier has been upgraded to handle challenging False Negative and False Positive cases.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview Information Protection: Shared mailbox support security group assignments on encrypted mail access in Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Members in mail-enabled security group that are assigned to a shared mailbox can access encrypted mail directly using Outlook for Windows. Users can access encrypted mail with Do Not Forward or Encrypt-only protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town Hall Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams town hall Graph APIs allow users to create, update, and delete town hall events.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Chat support to generate a SWOT analysis
CurrentVersion.description: Users can ask for a SWOT analysis or pro/con list of a document or topic that will analyze their document and bring in relevant enterprise and web context to inform the derived analysis. This feature is being removed from the roadmap as it describes a capability of Copilot Chat in Word and not a standalone capability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): New proactive assistance in Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Catch-up is a new experience in Copilot which aims to proactively help users catch up and take action on important updates. It contains a group of cards. Each card has an update related to an important meeting or document. It will work in M365chat and Teams Copilot. It shows up as a tab on the home page. This feature—Catch up tab which was released to some customers—will be rolled back completely. As a result of this roll back, no Copilot user will see the Catch up tab on the homepage of Copilot. All Copilot users will continue to see "Try These Prompts" as earlier. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance center: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Purview capabilities in Copilot for Security
CurrentVersion.description: With Microsoft Purview capabilities in Copilot for Security, your security teams gain unprecedented visibility across the security data. Microsoft Purview brings user risk and data risk insights to help the SOC with comprehensive and enriched signals to understand the full attack story and impact of a security incident. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance center: Insider Risk Management - Gain comprehensive summary of Insider Risk Management alerts with Copilot for Security
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot for Security is embedded in Insider Risk Management to summarize alerts to help accelerate data security investigations. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can help you create draft quizzes
CurrentVersion.description: To help teachers, staff, and information workers save time, Copilot in Forms can now generate ice breakers, fun trivia, quizzes, and assessments with correct answers, which helps users focus more on engagement and interaction with their audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
CurrentVersion.description: The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Automatic data preservation for high-risk users
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection in Microsoft Purview helps you protect your organization’s data by integrating dynamic insider risk levels, determined by data related activities, with various policy engines to automatically moving users in and out of policies as their risk levels change over time. The integration with Data Lifecycle Management will automatically apply retention labels to preserve deleted emails and files based on a user’s insider risk level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms helps you collect more responses to your surveys or quizzes
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Forms assists form owners by recommending optimal distribution channels and settings for sending forms or quizzes. This includes leveraging email, social media, and QR codes to maximize the benefits of digital forms and quizzes.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Updating all News Posts to "Made for Email"
CurrentVersion.description: Following the positive reception of the "Made for Email" News templates, we are rolling out a change that will make every news post you create "Made for Email" by default. Now, no matter how you create your new News Post, whether it is copying a previous post or using an existing template, you will have access to send that full distribution as an email.  With this change, authors will still have access to our full webpart library by selecting "all" webparts in the webpart picker but are defaulted into having additional sending functionality.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Apps: Availability of the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365 Government GCC
CurrentVersion.description:
The Cloud policy service will begin rolling out for Microsoft 365 GCC customers late June 2024. The Cloud Policy service allows Microsoft 365 administrators to configure policies for Microsoft 365 apps and assign these policies using Microsoft 365 or Entra ID groups. Once configured, these policies are automatically enforced as users sign in and use Microsoft 365 apps. The initial release will support policies for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise on Windows and future updates will bring support for additional applications and platforms. For additional information about the Cloud Policy service, refer to Overview of the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/deployoffice/admincenter/overview-office-cloud-policy-service

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Swipe in the Message List on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The Message List will now support Swipe from Left and Swipe from Right actions on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. As a result, some minor organization changes will also happen for the hover actions. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Meeting Details in the Reading Pane on Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When a conversation in Mail is part of a meeting, the Reading Pane will have a new and improved Meeting Details card for a more efficient and modern RSVP flow. This will come to Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support for Auto-Expanding Archives
CurrentVersion.description: Auto-Expanding Archives are a component that provides customers the ability to grow their mailbox archives over the normal 100 GB quota limit.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Teams Q&A to collect attendee questions in GCC
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Q&A enhances meeting and webinar participation for attendees by allowing participants to submit questions and engage in discussions. Organizers can moderate the Q&A feed, highlight important questions, and provide live answers. This feature is ideal for structured meetings and events, promoting an interactive and inclusive environment.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Site ownership policy
CurrentVersion.description: Site ownership policy is a one-stop solution to effectively manage ownership needs of all SharePoint sites in your tenant. It helps you to define your organization's ownership criteria and identify sites that are not compliant. You can further notify predefined set of users of your choice to find the next best site owner or admin. You can also choose to automate actions on sites that remain ownerless for more than 3 months to prevent risks of data mismanagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sharing Word, Excel, and PowerPoint local files through the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When users are in Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint apps, and they want to share a file that is saved locally in their device (not stored in a cloud location), the new Outlook for Windows will show up as a share target and they will be able to easily email the file. #newoutlookforwindows. This roadmap status was updated to Launched in error and has been corrected to Rolling out. We apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sharing Word, Excel, and PowerPoint local files through the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When users are in Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint apps, and they want to share a file that is saved locally in their device (not stored in a cloud location), the new Outlook for Windows will show up as a share target and they will be able to easily email the file. #newoutlookforwindows. This roadmap status was updated to "Rolling out" error and has been corrected to "In development." We apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Draft with Copilot will allow users to explicitly add and reference specific mails, meetings, and people. Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud—including emails and meetings—resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Copilot in Microsoft Teams chat and channels to summarize content over a specified period of time
CurrentVersion.description: You can now ask Copilot in chat and channels to respond to questions regarding a conversation in a specific time period, for example: last month.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling Assistant Updates
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the scheduling assistant view to help users have better readability. Some of these changes are in alignment to customer the feedback. These changes will also improve the grid lines, availability view, adding combined availability bar and much more. These updates will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Creation and Registration APIs
CurrentVersion.description: Customers now have additional capabilities to manage Webinars, namely the ability to create, update, and delete Webinars, as well as register attendees to existing Webinars using a new set of APIs.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex - Page range setting for prebuilt and structured models
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a new setting for prebuilt (contract, invoice, and receipt) and structured/freeform models to specify the file pages to be processed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated conversation actions on Outlook for Android
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for iOS. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updating Conversation Actions on Outlook for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs. With this update, you will also be able to access all conversation actions from the inbox view by long-pressing a message.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights employee engagement with leader communications report
CurrentVersion.description: We are assessing customer feedback to improve this report before fully rolling it out. We apologize for the inconvenience. Leaders will have a new report to help them understand the reach of their communications within their organization, and their employees’ engagement with their sent emails, meetings, and shared files to better understand the effectiveness of different modes of communication.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
CurrentVersion.description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
CurrentVersion.description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Text and UI resizing for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can adjust the size of the text and all other UI elements on the front-of-room display by changing the display scaling settings. Text and UI elements are resized and adjusted for all supported display resolution and scaling combinations (1080p resolution at 100-150% scaling, 4K resolution at 100-300% scaling). This capability is extended to support touch boards.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Open attachments in desktop apps from the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In the new Outlook for Windows, users can now open attachments of all types in their respective desktop app by double clicking them. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Cumulative Exfiltration Tuning
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Cumulative Exfiltration Activities will not be detected and scored if the events have already been detected in a previous Cumulative Exfiltration Activity risk. This change will reduce noise for alerts generated from Cumulative Exfiltration Activity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Bidirectional support for Teams Live Interpretation
CurrentVersion.description: With bidirectional support in Teams Live Interpretation, interpreters can now switch the direction they want to provide translation in between the two languages by clicking on the button of the language they want to interpret into at the bottom of the screen. The highlighted language button will be the language the interpreter is translating into and attendees hear from.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: IPv6 allow and block support in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create allow and block entries for IPv6 directly inside the Tenant Allow/Block List.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Add brand images in M365 Copilot from SharePoint organization asset libraries
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in PowerPoint and Word connects with your SharePoint organization asset library, making it easy to find and add images approved by your company to keep your presentation or document on brand.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature, users with access to Excel for Windows will be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks without any installation required. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will now also be available in Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Use Copilot to select and rewrite specific pieces of text in an email in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In classic Outlook for Windows, when composing an email, customers can select portions of text in an email and use Copilot to rewrite it. Users can give detailed instructions on how to rewrite and also able to modify tone and length.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy visibility for users with Copilot SKU and VL Seeded/Premium
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Copilot Academy will be available for all users with a Copilot for Microsoft License and any of Viva Learning licenses (Seeded or Premium). Admins will also be able to control visibility of Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort and Filter improvements on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Sort and Filter will now be separate buttons in the Message List. This will make it easier to change the Sorted by and the Filtered by values separately. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Ability to add apps to meetings
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, customers will be able to add apps to their meetings, similar to how they can do that in classic Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams admins in education will now be able to create and publish custom team templates
CurrentVersion.description: Education IT admins can now create team templates from Microsoft Teams admin center. As an admin, you can use templates to easily deploy consistent teams across your organization. With templates, your users can quickly create rich collaboration spaces with predefined settings, channels, and apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Dynamic internal benchmarks for Advanced Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Collaboration norms vary by roles and geographies, and comparing behavioral metrics across groups can draw misleading conclusions if those groups are comprised of different roles. Dynamic internal benchmarks allow the analyst to understand the expected behaviors of a group based on similar employees within the company.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Introduction to metrics and benchmarks in Advanced Insights
CurrentVersion.description: This report template for analysts in Advanced Insights provides an introduction to some of the most frequently used Viva Insights metrics, grounding both new and veteran analysts in their definitions, applications, and how their group's results compare to typical ranges using both internal and external benchmarks.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move menu improvements
CurrentVersion.description: Two improvements are coming to the move menu on Outlook for iOS and Android. Users will now be able to expand and collapse folders within the move menu and see folder hierarchy when searching in the move menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing
CurrentVersion.description: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing (IRR) enables customers to control the routing of inbound emails to comply with regional data regulations. IRR ensures emails sent to users within specific geo-regions are processed and stored in their respective region. By directing emails to Accepted Domains that are associated with specific geo-regions and users located in those same geo-regions, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User uploaded custom background images for the new VDI solution for Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: With this new feature, users on the new VDI solution for Teams can blur their background, choose a Teams virtual background, or replace their background entirely with any image they want by uploading it through the "Video effects and Settings" option.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Amplify editor
CurrentVersion.description: The superpowers of Copilot will be directly available to you in the Amplify editing experience to revolutionize the way you create and enhance content. Auto-rewrite will create suggestions based on the text you've written. Additionally, you can expand or condense what you have written. Copilot in Amplify will also help you adjust the tone of your content to ensure consistency across your communications and to best suit your audience, whether you need a casual tone for social messages, an engaging tone to compel and draw in your audience, or a professional tone for business communications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap support for ad-hoc meetings and calls
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is available for ad-hoc meetings and calls, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and started from chat. Now, Teams Premium and Copilot for Microsoft 365 licensed users can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When attending a meeting using a Teams Rooms on Windows device, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available on the Teams Rooms on Windows device for all in-tenant meetings. This feature requires the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
CurrentVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Audio zones enable Mesh creators to craft custom audio experiences
CurrentVersion.description: Spatial audio in Mesh provides a realistic recreation of how sound moves in the real world, with the volume of people speaking or media playing getting lower of as you move away from the source of the sound.  The introduction of audio zones enables creators to craft custom audio experiences for the intended use of a space with features such as extended audio drop off distances for conversations that happen in a large area, or restricting what audio can enter a given area, to allow smaller groups to have lively conversations without disrupting their neighbors.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams chat support in Mesh events
CurrentVersion.description: Participants in Mesh events on PC and Mac can use Teams chat to communicate with all participants, across all rooms, within a Mesh event. Users can do this in the Microsoft Mesh PC app, the Mesh app in Teams, as well as in the chat message list of the Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to exclude users and groups from IRM policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice and Face biometric data export controls
CurrentVersion.description: This new feature provides controls for biometric data export for users. To ensure security and protection of user privacy, individuals can export their own biometric data, limiting risk of download or sharing by tenant administrators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room audio auto-detect and pre-select in BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: When users connect their laptop to a room's shared peripheral through USB, Teams automatically detects the room's audio and recommends connecting on the pre-join screen, streamlining the bring your own device (BYOD) meeting room experience. For room devices (e.g., displays, audio devices) recognized as shared and on Microsoft's known BYOD devices list, users will automatically transition to the room's audio upon connection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh events allows for even better collaboration for more people by now supporting guest user attendees into the Mesh PC app. Event organizers can invite guest users outside their organization, providing an opportunity for broader collaboration and networking in Mesh events. Guests can sign in to the Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest user creation follows the existing process for tenant guest user creation (outside of Mesh). For this release, guest users would require a Teams Premium license, just like regular tenant attendees, to collaborate within Mesh. Guest access for the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Dashboard - Non-Copilot cohort and exclusion list using AAD Groups (Entra ID)
CurrentVersion.description: For the Copilot dashboard, the non-Copilot user cohort list and exclusion list can be managed by Global Administrators using AAD (Azure Active Directory) Groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Offline app boot
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces the ability to open or restart the new Outlook for Windows when not connected to the internet. Previously, you needed a connection to the internet to open or restart the new Outlook. Offline access is only supported when the app is already running and then goes offline. Opening and restarting the app while offline will be introduced with this rollout. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
CurrentVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge on MacOS now seamlessly opens links in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you set the default browser to Microsoft Edge on MacOS and enable the feature, web links from the Teams desktop app sent via chats, channels, calendar, and other entry points will seamlessly open automatically in the profile that is signed into Teams app and skips the need to reauthenticate in the browser making it faster and easier to access content.  Administrators can control the availability of this feature using the "Choose Which Browser Opens Web Links" Microsoft 365 policy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manual sync trigger options for provider data
CurrentVersion.description: Customers can manually trigger sync for different data types on Manage providers in Viva Learning admin page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Sync provider data from specific dates
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing flexibility on provider setup form where admins can sync data from specific dates for a provider instead of full data sync.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Editorial Card web part in SharePoint Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a Web Part called the Editorial Card to enhance page experiences. This card-like container allows for manual creation tailored to your needs, creating eye-catching content to capture viewers’ attentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Oversharing Pop-up enhancements on Outlook win32 desktop
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the functionality of oversharing pop-ups (Show policy tip as a dialog) in outlook win32 to support additional scenarios powered with predicates such as Content is not labeled and Message/Attachment is not labeled, File extension is. It will also support a customizable oversharing dialog with the ability to configure custom title, body, business justifications, and dynamic variables/tokens for matched recipients, attachment names, and labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Baseline with Task level variance
CurrentVersion.description: Capture a Baseline of your plan and view plan and task-level variances to know if the plan is on track or delayed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: File and conversation admin settings in Engage admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now manage file and conversation-related settings from the Engage admin center without being routed to the legacy Yammer admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: IntelliFrame video feed on Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Cloud IntelliFrame, the video framing feature that enhances the visibility of people in the room for online meeting attendees, is now available for Teams mobile users when they join a meeting that has participants in a Teams Rooms on Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Refresh queries from Authenticated Data Sources in Excel for the Web
CurrentVersion.description: You can now refresh Power Query data from data sources that require authentication in Excel for the Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Security policy violations by risky users
CurrentVersion.description: Enabled by the HR 1.2 connector, this policy template detects security violations by users near a stressor event. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Breakout rooms support for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With breakout room support, Teams Rooms on Windows can be added to a breakout room and moved in and out of the main room making it easy for breakout session coordination.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Contact deduplication on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description: People are at the center of our lives, and we start every digital connection via contacts. Hence, a clean, up-to-date contact list is critical for better collaboration and productivity. We are happy to announce that cleaning up duplicate contacts just got a lot easier with the de-duplication feature on New Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the Web
